title: Ajit Pawar Plane Crash Live Updates: NCP Chief Dies In Plane Crash, Was On Way To Campaign: Report
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and three other persons were killed after an aircraft carrying them crashed in Pune district on Wednesday morning, news agency PTI reported.

title: CA Aspirants, MBAs Behind Rs 16-Crore Sophisticated Fraud Network
content: In a major breakthrough against cybercrime, the Telangana Cyber Security Bureau (TGCSB) dismantled an interstate network responsible for high-value frauds totalling over Rs 16 crore through "digital arrest" cons and investment scams.

content: In a significant development pointing to deeper coordination among global terrorist groups, a senior terrorist commander of Pakistan-based Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) has publicly acknowledged links with Hamas and confirmed meetings with its top leadership

content: The first phase of the Parliament's Budget Session begins today with President Droupadi Murmu's address to the nation, days before the Narendra Modi government presents the Union Budget.

title: Taliban's New Law Legalises Slavery In Afghanistan, Makes Mullahs Immune
content: The Taliban has formally entrenched a class-based justice system in Afghanistan under a newly enacted Criminal Procedure Code signed by its supreme leader, Hibatullah Akhundzada.

title: Budget Session 2026 Live Updates: President Droupadi Murmu To Address Joint Sitting
content: Budget Session 2026 Live Updates: President Droupadi Murmu will address a joint sitting of the Lok Sabha and Rajy Sabha On Wednesday.

title: Father Of NEET Aspirant Threatens Self-Immolation Over Probe Delay
content: The father of the NEET aspirant, who recently died after remaining in a coma for several days in a Patna hospital, has sought a judicial probe into the incident, expressing dissatisfaction with the police investigation.

title: Video: Ilhan Omar Sprayed With Unknown Liquid While Condemning ICE Actions
content: A man sprayed an unknown substance on Democratic US Representative Ilhan Omar and was tackled to the ground Tuesday during a town hall she was hosting in Minneapolis.

title: Drug Smuggler Who Fled During Nepal's Gen-Z Protests Arrested In Gujarat
content: In a significant move, Ahmedabad Special Operations Group (SOG) Crime Branch, an international narcotics smuggler who escaped a Nepalese prison during massive civil unrest has been arrested in Gujarat.

title: HR Manager Killed By Lover In Agra. He Chops Up Body, Throws Head In Canal
content: A 30-year-old man allegedly killed his lover in Uttar Pradesh's Agra, chopped up her body, put her head in a bag, and threw it in a canal, a police official said on Tuesday.

title: Russia-Ukraine War Has Caused Nearly 2 Million Military Casualties: Report
content: Russia's grinding invasion of Ukraine has caused nearly two million military casualties -- killed, wounded or missing -- between the two countries, according to a study published Tuesday by a US think tank.

title: Opinion: Opinion | On The Plate: How India-EU FTA Will (And Won't) Change Indian Kitchens
content: For all those who had been waiting since 2007 for the much-anticipated India-European Union (EU) Free Trade Agreement (FTA), the wait will end only next year after the European Parliament finally ratifies the "mother of all deals" sealed in New Delhi

title: TDP Pushes For Amaravati Capital Status, Social Media Ban For Minors At All-Party Meet
content: The Telugu Desam Party (TDP), a key ally in the NDA, has intensified its demand for giving Amaravati permanent legal status as the capital of Andhra Pradesh.

title: Son Of Government Official, 16, Rams BMW Into Scooter To "Settle Score" In Nashik
content: A 16-year-old boy driving a BMW car hit a scooter from the rear side, seriously injuring its two occupants in Nashik city of Maharashtra, a fallout of a past dispute between the trio, police said on Tuesday.

title: On Camera, Massive Avalanche Hits J&K's Sonamarg, Burying Houses In Snow
content: A massive avalanche swept through the Sarbal area of Sonamarg in Jammu & Kashmir's Ganderbal district Tuesday night, engulfing houses and vehicles.

title: Case Against Ex-Bengaluru Techie For Stealing Software Data Worth Rs 87 Crore
content: An FIR has been registered against a former senior employee of an IT firm for allegedly stealing the company's proprietary software source code valued at approximately Rs 87 crore, police said on Tuesday.

title: Iran US Tension Highlights: Trump Convinced 'To Give Iran A Chance' After Threats
content: Iran said that it will defend itself "against any foreign threat," the country's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said on Thursday.

title: German Chancellor In India Highlights: PM Modi Hails India-Germany Ties After Meeting With Merz
content: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz's India Tour Highlights: Merz's visit from Monday -- his first to an Asian country since he took office last May -- comes two weeks ahead of a planned EU-India summit.

title: Boxing divisional rankings: Muratalla climbs after IBF title defense over Cruz
content: the lightweights were separated by one punch on CompuBox, but Muratalla appeared to land the harder punches . it was the first time that the lightweight champion fought past 10 rounds in his seven-fight pro career . he moves up to no. 4 from no. 6 in the ESPN lightweight rankings .

title: Super Bowl betting buzz: How one bettor's $100 bet could turn into $310,000
content: our super bowl betting buzz file aims to provide fans a look at the sports betting stories leading up to the big game . the matchup for super Bowl LX is set with the Seattle Seahawks favored over the new England Patriots to take home the Lombardi Trophy .

title: MLS, Polymarket join forces in prediction markets
content: the NHL became the first major professional U.S. league to announce a deal with prediction markets in October last year . prediction markets such as Polymarket and Kalshi allow users to trade on the yes/no outcome of events .

title: UCLA's Bob Chesney: Coal miner, bartender, coach of the Bruins
content: new coach Bob Chesney has mined coal, slung Red Bull and vodkas behind a bar . he has worked every on-field job from strength coach to special teams coach . "he's the kind of guy I want to get in the foxhole with," athletic director says .

title: Six predictions and 15 NFL draft prospects to watch in Mobile
content: top 2026 prospects are converging on mobile, Alabama, this week for the Panini Senior Bowl . the annual invite-only showcase begins with practices Tuesday and concludes with a game Saturday (2:30 p.m. ET, NFL Network). there are two-hour practice sessions Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday .

title: 'Shankarcharya' row: Ayodhya GST deputy commissioner quits in support of PM, CM
content: A senior UP tax officer resigned Tuesday, citing deep hurt over Swami Avimukteshwaranand's remarks against PM Modi, Home Minister Amit Shah, and CM Yogi Adityanath. This move counters a protest exit by another officer, sharpening a standoff linked to the seer's Magh Mela protest over alleged obstruction and a notice regarding his Shankaracharya claim.

title: 16-year-old driving BMW hits scooter over past feud in Nashik
content: In a shocking incident in Nashik, a 16-year-old behind the wheel of a BMW collided with a scooter carrying two 14-year-olds, resulting in serious injuries. Authorities took the teen into custody, noting that he had harbored a grudge against one of the victims for seven months. Following a court appearance, the juvenile was placed in a remand facility.

title: Anthropic CEO hints from Davos that Zuckerberg was wrong to let Yann LeCun leave Meta
content: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei contrasted AI companies led by scientists with those run by social media entrepreneurs, implicitly criticizing Meta's direction following Yann LeCun's departure. LeCun reportedly clashed with Mark Zuckerberg over research priorities, leading to his exit and the hiring of a younger executive. This move highlights a perceived difference in approach to AI development and responsibility.

title: Maharashtra deputy CM Ajit Pawar, 4 others dead after aircraft crashes in Baramati
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others tragically died when their aircraft crashed in Baramati, Pune district, on Wednesday morning. The plane went down while attempting an emergency landing around 8:45 am. Visuals from the scene showed the wreckage engulfed in flames.

title: Arijit Singh says he‚Äôs not done with music: Why is he quitting playback singing?
content: Popular Bollywood singer Arijit Singh, who wooed generations with his soulful voice in songs like Tum Hi Ho, Kesariya and Channa Mereya, left fans stunned after announcing that he will no longer take up new assignments as a playback vocalist. While calling time on one chapter of his career, Arijit made it clear that he is not stepping away from music itself.

title: OpenAI VP Matt Knight resigns; shares 'note' sent to company on X
content: OpenAI's Chief Information Security Officer, Matt Knight, has resigned after over five years, having joined as the company's first security hire in 2020. Knight oversaw the development of OpenAI's security program, which now protects a global platform used by millions. He also led security product development, including the launch of Aardvark, before his departure.

title: ‚ÄòBig call awaits‚Äô: Ex-batter warns Gambhir‚Äôs job at risk if India fail to defend T20 WC
content: Former India batter Manoj Tiwary suggests the BCCI might make a significant decision regarding head coach Gautam Gambhir if Team India fails to win the T20 World Cup. Despite public backing, Tiwary believes poor results in other formats could lead to a change, with VVS Laxman identified as a potential successor.

title: Actor Varun Dhawan fined after viral grab-handle video in Mumbai Metro
content: Actor Varun Dhawan faced a Rs 500 fine for causing a public nuisance on the Mumbai Metro. A viral video showed him hanging from grab handles, prompting the metro operator to issue a safety advisory. The operator emphasized that such actions endanger passengers and violate safety norms, leading to penalties under the Metro Railways Act.

title: Devotees locked inside Odisha church, 30 families claim 'harassment' over prayers
content: Tensions have escalated in Odisha's Kapena village where local Christian families confront intimidation and threats intended to coerce them into renouncing their beliefs. A recent disturbance at a prayer service resulted in two young residents being reportedly attacked.

title: Japan‚Äôs second-richest man drops $50 billion plan to buy US company
content: SoftBank's Masayoshi Son has reportedly halted talks to acquire US data center operator Switch Inc., a move that impacts his ambitious Stargate AI infrastructure plans. The $50 billion deal, crucial for generating computing power for OpenAI, faced internal concerns over its size and logistics. While a full acquisition is off, discussions for a partial investment or partnership continue.

title: ‚ÄòBad for cricket, don‚Äôt spoil ties‚Äô: Ex-Pakistan stars warn PCB against T20 WC boycott
content: Former Pakistan cricketers and officials are urging the PCB to participate in the T20 World Cup, warning against a boycott in solidarity with Bangladesh. They emphasise prioritising Pakistan's cricketing interests and maintaining good relations with the International Cricket Council and member boards.  Concerns are raised about potential logistical and financial repercussions.

title: ‚ÄòAnother beautiful armada floating towards Iran‚Äô: Trump issues warning as tensions rise
content: US President Trump announced another US "armada" is heading towards Iran, expressing hope for a deal amidst heightened regional tensions. This follows increased US military activity, with Iran issuing sharp warnings against any attacks originating from neighbouring countries. While diplomacy is mentioned, military options remain on the table.

title: Avalanche hits J&K‚Äôs Sonamarg after heavy snowfall, burying houses and resorts ‚Äî video
content: A massive avalanche struck Sonamarg tourist resort in Jammu and Kashmir late Tuesday night, captured on CCTV, but miraculously caused no loss of life. Heavy snowfall across the valley led to flight cancellations at Srinagar airport, stranding tourists, and the closure of the Srinagar-Jammu national highway. Authorities are actively engaged in rescue and clearance operations.

title: Anna Kupp sparks debate wearing Seahawks coat against Rams in NFC showdown
content: Cooper Kupp‚Äôs NFC Championship appearance against his former Rams blended football and family into one powerful moment. Now with the Seahawks, the Super Bowl MVP faced his past while drawing strength from his wife Anna and their three sons. The matchup symbolized resilience, loyalty, and a fresh chapter driven by purpose.

title: Patrick Mahomes rehabs quietly as Brittany Mahomes ensures stability for their kids
content: Patrick Mahomes is enduring a demanding offseason as he recovers from an ACL and LCL tear, limiting his usual family routine. While he focuses on rehabilitation and a possible Week 1 return, Brittany Mahomes is creating joyful moments for their children, helping maintain normalcy as the Chiefs star patiently works through recovery.

title: Travis Kelce supports Taylor Swift amid legal troubles as wedding plans pause
content: Travis Kelce has become a steady source of support for Taylor Swift as she navigates emotional strain linked to ongoing legal troubles around her inner circle. While staying publicly silent, Swift has leaned on Kelce‚Äôs guidance to protect her peace, set boundaries, and address personal tensions directly, even as wedding plans remain on pause.

title: Watch: UK PM dons aviators to poke fun at Macron; French PM plays plays along
content: British prime minister Keir Starmer playfully mimicked French President Emmanuel Macron's recent aviator sunglasses appearance at Davos. Starmer donned sunglasses and greeted the audience with "Bonjour," referencing Top Gun, to which Macron responded in the comments. Macron's sunglasses were later explained as a medical necessity due to a burst blood vessel in his eye.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 25,300; BSE Sensex up over 500 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmarks, opened in green on Wednesday. While Nifty50 went above 25,300, BSE Sensex was up over 500 points.

title: Watch: Jimmy Kimmel breaks down on air over ICE killing of Alex Pretti
content: Jimmy Kimmel became emotional on his show, weeping twice while discussing the fatal shooting of ICU nurse Alex Pretti by ICE agents in Minneapolis. He described the events as atrocities committed by "goons" and urged for courage from the right. Kimmel expressed personal distress, noting family in the city and the fear gripping residents.

title: Varanasi: Man kills friend after being tricked into eating ‚Äòcow meat‚Äô
content: The streets of Varanasi are buzzing with news after the arrest of 24-year-old Virendra Yadav, who stands accused of taking the life of his friend Aftab Alam, 28. Sources indicate that Yadav admitted to the murder, stating he acted out of deep embarrassment when Alam tricked him into eating cow meat and subsequently exposed him.

title: 'Reserve that table forever': Sunita Williams‚Äô Falooda break in Kerala goes viral
content: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams, recently retired from NASA, was spotted enjoying a falooda in Kozhikode, Kerala. The video of her casually savoring the local dessert with strangers has gone viral, highlighting her grounded nature despite her remarkable achievements in space exploration.

title: 4th T20I: Ruthless India keen to extend domination against New Zealand
content: India's T20 World Cup preparations are on track with a dominant series win against New Zealand. Suryakumar Yadav's side has showcased ruthless batting, with Abhishek Sharma and the captain himself finding form. While the batting order shows depth, Sanju Samson faces pressure. Bowlers like Bumrah and Bishnoi have impressed, setting a strong tone for the upcoming tournament.

title: ‚ÄòIndia comes out on top‚Äô: Trump aide's big remark after New Delhi's deal with EU
content: US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer stated India is the primary beneficiary of the new EU free trade agreement, citing global trade tensions and US tariffs as drivers. Greer believes India gains significant market access to Europe, potentially benefiting from increased worker mobility, while the EU embraces globalization.

title: 'Very proud of ancestral roots in Goa': European Council chief flaunts OCI card‚Äîwatch
content: European Council President Antonio Costa expressed pride in his Goan roots, highlighting his personal connection to India as the EU and India concluded an ambitious free trade agreement. This historic moment marks a new chapter in their relations, strengthening ties in trade, security, and people-to-people connections.

title: KL Rahul drops retirement bombshell: 'When it's time, it's time'
content: KL Rahul has admitted that retirement has crossed his mind, though he believes it is still some time away and won't be a difficult decision when the moment arrives.

title: Chilling dashcam, CCTV footage shows Bengaluru techie crushing bodybuilder to death
content: A Bengaluru man was deliberately killed by his friend after an argument escalated during a cricket game and alcohol consumption. The victim, Prashanth M, clung to the SUV of the accused, Roshan Hegde, who then intentionally crashed the vehicle twice, resulting in Prashanth's death. Dashcam footage revealed the fatal sequence of events.

title: Shooting near US‚ÄìMexico border: One critical after Border Patrol-linked incident‚Äî what we know
content: A shooting near the US-Mexico border in Arivaca, Arizona, has left one person in critical condition. The incident involved the US Border Patrol, and authorities, including the FBI and Pima County Sheriff's Department, are investigating. The injured individual received immediate medical attention and was airlifted to a trauma center.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: According to Mehul Kothari, DVP - Technical Research, Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers, the top stocks to buy today (January 28, 2026) are Chennai Petroleum, Oil India, and Punjab National Bank (PNB). Let‚Äôs take a look:

title: Watch: Nasa research plane makes emergency belly landing in Texas; crew safe
content: A Nasa research plane made an emergency landing in Texas on Tuesday. The aircraft's landing gear failed to deploy, forcing it to slide on its belly. Videos showed sparks and smoke as the plane came to a stop at Ellington Airport near Houston. Both crew members landed safely.

title: 'Border 2' sees huge drop; earns Rs 19.5cr on day 5
content: 'Border 2' experienced a significant box office dip on its first Tuesday, collecting approximately Rs 19.5 crore after a massive Republic Day haul. Despite a strong opening and an impressive Rs 59 crore on Monday, the film's occupancy dropped considerably. However, with a current net collection of Rs 196.50 crore and a worldwide total of Rs 270.

title: 'Attacked with knife': How suspicion over relationship led to HR manager's beheading at workplace
content: An HR manager in Agra was allegedly beheaded and dismembered by her lover after an argument over her contact with another man. The accused attempted to dispose of the body parts in the Yamuna River but fled when noticed by passersby. He later confessed to the crime after being arrested.

title: Virat and Anushka spotted on day out in London
content: Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma were recently spotted in London, enjoying a quiet outing after a busy period. The power couple, who have been dividing their time between India and the UK to raise their children away from the spotlight, were seen in winter wear, delighting fans with a selfie.

title: 'One bad day can undo everything': Dravid cautions Team India, reflects on 2023 WC pain
content: Former India coach Rahul Dravid believes India is a strong contender to win the upcoming T20 World Cup. He praises the team's current approach and their consistent performance. Dravid also credits Rohit Sharma for transforming India's white-ball cricket. He emphasizes that despite their strength, T20 cricket demands peak performance on the day.

title: ‚ÄòVery bad choice‚Äô: Trump warns US will end support for Iraq if Maliki returns as PM
content: US President Donald Trump warned that the U.S. would cease all support for Iraq if ex-prime minister Nouri al-Maliki returns to power. Trump cited Maliki's previous tenure, which he claims led to poverty and chaos, as a reason for this stance. This intervention follows similar concerns raised by Secretary of State Marco Rubio.

title: Delhi sees wettest January in 4 years, February to start with rain
content: Delhi experienced its wettest January in four years, with Tuesday's rainfall pushing the month's total to 25.3 mm. While more rain is unlikely until February 1st, the city's air quality worsened to 'very poor' following the downpour. Temperatures saw a dip, with a significant rise in the minimum temperature.

title: Wetzel: Let football be football. And let it snow.
content: new England beat Denver 10-7 in the aFC championship game . the teams combined for just 48 fourth-quarter yards and zero points . there was plenty of complaining on social media about how the elements shouldn't impact games of such magnitude . can football still be football and not tinkered with until it is some algorithm-based product .

title: The 10 NBA teams that have the most to trade for Giannis
content: the 18-26 Bucks are on pace for their worst record in 10 years . they are in danger of picking in the lottery f1 . if Antetokounmpo is drafted, the Bucks will face a franchise-altering decision .

title: 2026 Big Ten college football: Schedules for all 18 conference teams
content: the big Ten announced its 2026 college football schedule for each of its 18 members . each team -- except for USC -- will only have one bye week . new head coaches at Michigan, Michigan State, Penn State and UCLA in 2026 .

title: Aaron Judge selected as MLB The Show 26 cover athlete
content: Aaron Judge becomes the second player to appear on the game's cover twice . the game launches on march 17 with early access beginning on march 13 . judge is shown in the new york Yankees ' iconic pinstripes .

title: Santiago Gimenez interview: World Cup dreams for Mexico, friendship with Pulisic

title: MMA divisional rankings: 10 ranked fighters at UFC 324 -- and only one moved
content: the men's flyweight fight won by Natalia Silva did not produce a change in that top 10 . the only rankings change came at heavyweight, where Waldo Cortes-Acosta moved up one spot to no. 6 .

title: Despite a 'disaster' debut season, Jets still believe in Aaron Glenn
content: Aaron Glenn took an early-evening walk around the perimeter of the new york Jets . he would wake up at 3:30 a.m., unable to sleep because of anticipation of his first practice . "it hit me, and it hit me pretty hard," a wistful Glenn says .

title: The two sides of Mitch Marner's return home to Toronto
content: the Toronto Maple Leafs honor Mitch Marner in a tribute video . the star player spent nine seasons with the team . he left his hometown team and joined the Vegas Golden Knacks . marner's car was stolen and his address was leaked online .

content: No suspicious objects or explosive materials have been found during the search so far, the Gurugram Police said

content: The airline has extended the cancellation of these flights because of tensions that have escalated between Iran and the U.S.

title: PNB to expand digital, startup banking presence in Bengaluru
content: PNB is planning to open digital branches in major technology parks across Bengaluru, aimed at addressing the evolving banking needs of professionals, corporates, and digitally savvy customers

title: Indore water contamination: MP HC sets up probe panel, calls for urgent judicial scrutiny
content: The State government on January 27, 2026 told the HC that the deaths of 16 persons in Indore‚Äôs Bhagirathpura area were possibly linked to a month-long outbreak of vomiting and diarrhoea caused by contaminated drinking water

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026 LIVE: President Droupadi Murmu to address both Houses of Parliament
content: The Economic Survey of India is scheduled to be presented on January 29, followed by the Union Budget 2026-27, to be presented on February 1, 2026

title: India looking to deepen global aviation partnerships at Wings India 2026, says Civil Aviation Minister Rammohan Naidu
content: Union Civil Aviation Minister K. Rammohan Naidu said India wants to deepen its relationships with organisations and countries across the world, particularly in aviation

title: Private sleeper bus catches fire near Hosanagara in Karnataka
content: Three people, including the driver and conductor, suffered burn injuries, while a few others sustained minor injuries

title: Kadavanthra-Panampilly Nagar circular feeder bus service extended
content: Kochi Metro Rail Limited managing director Loknath Behera flagged off the extended service at a function held in Kasturba Nagar.

title: Avalanche hits J&K‚Äôs Sonamarg tourist resort; officials say no casualty
content: Officials said the avalanche hit Sonamarg resort in central Kashmir‚Äôs Ganderbal district at 10:12 p.m.

title: Telangana DGP commends Sarvejana Foundation‚Äôs road safety initiatives
content: He was speaking after releasing road safety stickers and a short awareness film titled Badram Naanna at the DGP office in Hyderabad

title: Tharoor stays silent on CPI(M) leanings but vows direct talks with Congress leaders
content: The Congress MP clarifies that his absence from the high-level Congress meeting in New Delhi was simply a matter of bad timing

title: Multi-Lane Free Flow tolling pilot soon on Bengaluru‚ÄìMysuru highway
content: The MLFF system replaces traditional toll booths with overhead gantries equipped with satellite-based GPS technology, high-performance RFID FASTag readers and Automated Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) cameras.

title: Three arrested, drugs worth ‚Çπ4 lakh seized in separate cases in Bengaluru

title: How a political and legal battle halted efforts to conserve Tiruvannamalai temple 25 years ago
content: More than two decades ago, the Archaeological Survey of India proposed to declare the Arunachaleswara temple a ‚Äúmonument of national importance.‚Äù The proposal, however, was shelved after a row fomented by vested interests

title: Capturing the cruelty of leprosy in a dark and merciless language
content: The anguish and alienation associated with leprosy have long made it a potent subject in literature, inspiring some of the modern writing in Tamil

content: ‚ÄúProhibitive cost of education, lack of good teaching staff, infrastructure, patient load, and stipend deterrents,‚Äù experts said

title: Heavy police deployment to ensure peaceful municipal elections in Telangana

title: Excise in Kochi steps up anti-drug drive with new intelligence wing
content: Two teams, comprising 22 officials, deployed to gather intelligence on suspected trafficking of narcotic items and other contraband; excise in talks with Narcotics Control Bureau to expand intelligence network

title: In a fresh attack, Rohini Acharya alleges RJD is on the brink of ruin
content: Few days back, she had criticised the members of her family for allegedly destroying a legacy, and claimed that outsiders are not needed for that.

title: A political dust storm over the Singareni coal mines
content: The Congress and the BRS are involved in mudslinging over the alleged irregularities in tenders for removal of overburden in the coal mines.

title: Stalin launches project for women‚Äôs safety, HPV vaccination initiative at global summit
content: Tamil Nadu Women Employment and Safety Project will promote sustainable and inclusive economic development through targeted interventions for employment, safety, and empowerment. The vaccination drive will begin in Ariyalur, Dharmapuri, Perambalur, and Tiruvannamalai districts

title: After AIADMK comes to power, families of tamers killed in jallikattu will be given ‚Çπ10 lakh, says Palaniswami

title:
A.P. govt. rolls out SOP for scientific 
de-siltation of urban drains
content: The SOP mandates replacing sporadic, reactive drain cleaning with a planned, technology-driven and accountability-based system, says official

title: Integrated laboratories in 13 Area Hospitals in A.P. to be ready by April
content: 134 tests relating to communicable and non-communicable diseases can be performed at these labs being set up under PM-ABHIM at a cost of ‚Çπ16.25 crore

content: Various State and non-State actors wanted them to carry narratives of their choice, but most of these journalists resisted,‚Äù MP Engineer Rashid said

content: The move comes after demand for non-vegetarian food on the train by a section of passengers, and the support of some BJP leaders from West Bengal

title: In a first, private technical staff to assist officials in Census

content: The company‚Äôs key capabilities in India include the India Validation Centre, the country‚Äôs only facility capable of processing 300mm wafers

title: Maharashtra government temporarily suspends eviction of tribals from Sanjay Gandhi National Park

title: SIR hearing: Place in electoral roll is a ‚Äòqualified right‚Äô, Election Commission says in Supreme Court
content: SIR seeks to verify, not determine citizenship, says Election Commission; adds that a place in the electoral roll is a ‚Äúqualified right‚Äù, according to eligibility parameters in the Constitution, Representation of the People Act

title: New UGC equity regulations spark student protests, political fallout in U.P.

title: BJP president Nitin Nabin visits West Bengal
content: Instead of visiting Kolkata, the BJP president chose Durgapur and Asansol in the south western part of the State. The region has a strong BJP presence and the party‚Äôs performance in this part of the state is crucial in the upcoming assembly polls

title: Only two Nipah virus disease cases reported in West Bengal since December 2025, says Health Ministry
content: A total of 196 contacts linked to the confirmed cases have been identified, traced, monitored, and tested. All traced contacts have been found asymptomatic and have tested negative

title: Twenty20‚Äôs entry into NDA was not to evade ED case, says Sabu Jacob

title: MLB's top five breakout teams for 2026: A healthier Braves squad? A bounce-back in Baltimore?
content: a breakout team is a club that wins at least 10 more games than what would be expected by its established level of play . we'll use wins per 162 games for the previous two seasons, while giving double weight to the most recent season . last season, the highest baseline win level was the Los Angeles Dodgers .
